item.title: Secure software delivery with Flux and Open Component Model
item.description: The source code for the demo can be found at https://github.com/open-component-model/demo-secure-delivery Overview This walkthrough deploys a full end-to-end pipeline demonstrating how OCM and Flux can be employed to deploy applications in air-gapped environments.
